properties.entry: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') REPLY_CREATE_DT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, REPLY_STATUS_CD, REPLY_STATUS_NM FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN REPLY_STATUS USING(REPLY_STATUS_CD) WHERE REPLY_STATUS_NM != '삭제' AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_STATUS_CD = 3 WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
